title: A simple principle
body: Though Straton himself never used the term, his remark about the inescapable materiality of life - that like th bronze giant Talos...

title: Talos Principle
body: Whether it is true that Daedalus constructed the giant Talos, or as others say he was the creation of Hephaestus...

title: The human machine
body: One day you discover that you are not a human being, but a machine....
